701423f-a.text:
724 to 736 Magenta Street, south side, east from Cruger to Holland Avenues. Also shown (right) is the Cruger Avenue side of No. 724.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr

701424f-a.text:
736 Magenta Street, south side, between Cruger and Holland
Aves.
About 1927.
W. B. Vernam.
